meanings.sent1: She outwept all her friends at the sad movie.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, she outwept her sister during the emotional play.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outwept her teddy bear when she lost it.
meanings.sent4: Her tears outwept the rain pouring down outside.
meanings.sent5: The widow outwept everyone at the funeral, her sorrow palpable.

meanings.definition: to weep more than someone else
meanings.sent1: He always outwept his siblings whenever they watched a touching movie.
meanings.sent2: During the competition, she outwept her opponent to win the sympathy of the judges.
meanings.sent3: The puppy outwept its owner to get an extra treat.
meanings.sent4: Her heart outwept her eyes as she listened to the heartbreaking story.
meanings.sent5: The child outwept the entire class when he dropped his ice cream cone.
